Primary Contact: Dawn Anthony, Information Development - Community Services; Phone: 250.763.8008 ext 125; Email: dawn@kcr.ca
Alternate Contact: Dawn Wilkinson, Community Services Manager; Phone: 250.763.8008 ext 124; Email: informkelowna@kcr.ca
Service Details: Provides information about the community, its resources and volunteer opportunities by phone, email, in-person, or online utilizing KCR's regional Online Directory of Community Resources
Address & Map: 620 Leon AveKelowna, BC     V1Y 9T2View MapQuest Map
Print Material: The publications listed below are available for download from https://kcr.ca/publications/ (with the exception of the Directory which is $30 per copy)- Adult Services Guide- Basic Needs Resource Listing- Children and Youth with Special Needs Resource Guide for Service Providers- Child, Youth & Family Mental Health & Substance Use Resource Guide for Professionals & Service Providers- Directory of Community Services- Holiday Events Guide- Legal Services Guide- Media Resource Guide- Mental Health Resources for Children and Youth (for families)- Monthly e-Bulletin (to sign up, click the 'Additional Info' link above)- Public Computer Access (CAP) List- Seniors Health - Health and Wellness Resources for Chronic Disease and the Elderly- Suicide Prevention Handbook- Street Survival Guide- Volunteer Income Tax Clinic List- Women's Resource Guide- Youth Services Guide- Offers a selection of community resource brochures to individual members of the public
